SERVICES AND SKILLS

Front End Development

Javascript, SASS, React

I enjoy working with front end web technologies to create vivid and functional websites and web applications.

When I am not learning how the web works I am tinkering with operating systems to better understand errors and better optimize my workflow.

Web Development and Web Hosting Services

I strive to be a well rounded developer capable of keeping client interactions in house so that I can happily provide a full product while keeping everything in-house.
